positive: LOOOOOOOOOL, you mean like you can do whatever you want with the software, like tweak it however you want, like Windows & Linux & Android allow xD xD xD Apple (with the exception of the Apple Watch and the first 4 iPhones) is like a BMW.
Good performance, clearly overpriced, and yet not as luxurious as a Bentley Rolls Royce - but even BMW is better, more customization, more freedom with your device and not dumbed down.

It's mostly similar to a Macbook Air, complete with its pretty good battery life (not as good, but good for the size of the battery and can even run off of a 20W charger) and quiet operation, and that's a superb laptop considering the price and what you get for it.
